name: Color Factory (DEMO)
description:
We're running out of colors!

"You must hurry!  We have specific requests for the colors we want in each container, but some of them are different from the rest.  Just fill a full tank of each color we want and everything will be good, okay?  If you don't do this, well, you're fired!"

Color Factory is a game where each level is a specified color you must collect while simultaneously avoiding colors that are not needed.

This is a demo, some graphics are not finished, not all levels are made, and not all bugs are resolved.  To help improve the game in future versions, please report bugs or things that the game is lacking.
